answers.answer: Just a drink...  Is not bad

You'll have to drink the glucose drink in five or ten minutes or less while the doctors in the room..then an hour later you will have blood drawn if you end up being positive for gestational diabetes I'm sure your doctor will call when results come in..I never had it and just showed up to my next appointment
They give u a drink I heard people say it's really sweet then u wait 1 hour and they take ur blood and call u later with ur results

The drink is almost sickeningly sweet.  You drink it and then they take some blood after an hour.  All the sugar made my baby very active.  If you don't pass the test the first time they may make you take a second test.

For my test, i had to drink an orange drink tasted like a flat orange soda. I had 5mins to drink it. Then had to wait an hour, they pricked my finger and got some blood. And had my results within a minute. The drink gave me heartburn. And it sort of burned going down my throat. But, nothing to stress over. Its really not bad.

question: So I have my Glucose test on the 16 of january . What should I expect ?
title: What should i expect ?
